project_descr: It aims to strengthen capacities of local hurals to fulfil their representational and oversight mandates for improved accountability of local governments and local service delivery.

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to assist in strengthening local self-governing bodies through rolling out nationwide training, improved downward accountability of elected representatives and increased oversight capacity of local hurals.
donor_name: SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC

document_name: https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/MNG/Project Document_Capacity Strengthening of Local Self-Governing Bodies.pdf
project_title: capacity strengthening of local self-governing bodies
